table.jobs: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `crawler_jobs` ( `id` int(5) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `position` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `published_date` date NOT NULL, `employer` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `location` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `start_date` date NOT NULL, `url` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB
